channel.title: Home on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Blog

item.title: Music Week - 06 - 2020
item.description: For this week, I found new sound nuggets which I would like to share with you all Divine - Sher Aaya Sher I got introduced to GULLY BOY songs pretty late but man o man they are a force of nature. I specially like this song and the rap. Gryffin - Nobody Compares to You This is such a goody good song. I have been following Gryffin for sometime now and this song I feel has the right melody, bass and drums.

item.title: Music Week - 04 - 2020
item.description: While working on my side projects and at work, below songs are the ones I have been listening to on a regular basis. Hopefully, you find a gem or two in here: Bishop Briggs - River It's an uplifting track I think. I like how the song is shot. Faime - Rain This one is a beauty here. Such a nice melodic tune, makes you wanna just sit and relax.
